indonesian: PAKU MENGUSA PAKU MENGUSA Pagi Bu. Ini sudah siang Andi. Kenapa kamu bangun se siang ini? Maaf Bu, ini kan hari minggu. Lagi pula jarang aku bangun siang. Kita akan segera mulai makan siang. Ajak ayahmu untuk bergabung. Harum sekali baunya. Makan apa kita siang ini Bu? Sop buntut. Minggu lalu kamu bilang ingin sekali makan sob buntut. Terima kasih banyak Bu. Ayah ada di mana? Dia ada di Kebun. Sibuk dengan tanamannya. Baik Bu, aku panggil ayah dulu.
eng: The End Good morning, Mother. It's already late, Andy. Why did you wake up at this hour? I'm sorry, Mother. It's Monday. It's too late to wake up at this hour. We'll start eating at this hour. I'll ask your father to join us. It smells so good. What should we eat at this hour, Mother? Buntoot soup. Last week, you said you wanted to eat Buntoot soup. Thank you very much, Mother. Where is your father? He's in Kebun, busy with his land. Okay, Mother. I'll call him first.
